meanings.definition: People who are enthusiastic about disco music.
meanings.sent1: The discophiles danced all night to their favorite disco tunes.
meanings.sent2: Many discophiles enjoy attending disco-themed parties.
meanings.sent3: The discophiles couldn't resist grooving to the disco beat.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of music genres, the discophiles stood out like glittering disco balls.
meanings.sent5: The passion of the discophiles for disco music was infectious.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who collect and listen to disco records.
meanings.sent1: The discophiles gathered every weekend to swap disco records.
meanings.sent2: Some discophiles have rare and valuable disco vinyl in their collections.
meanings.sent3: The discophiles' disco record collection was the envy of all music lovers.
meanings.sent4: Among the discophiles, each disco record held a special place in their hearts.
meanings.sent5: The discophiles' dedication to their disco records was unwavering.
